getAppRootRepository

public ManagedFile getAppRootRepository()
Description copied from interface: FileContext
The top most application folder. If the application is packaged as an war file, this is the same as FileContext.getAppWebRootRepository().

Specified by:
getAppRootRepository in interface FileContext
Returns:
ManagedFile representing the top most folder of the aplication's reference

getAppWebRootRepository

public ManagedFile getAppWebRootRepository()
The web application folder. If the application is packaged as an war file, this is the same as FileContext.getAppRootRepository().

Specified by:
getAppWebRootRepository in interface FileContext
Returns:
ManagedFile representing the web application folder root.

getAppWebRestrictedRootRepository

public ManagedFile getAppWebRestrictedRootRepository()
The web application folder that is not acessible by the web client. If the application is packaged as an war file, this should point to the WEB-INF folder.

Specified by:
getAppWebRestrictedRootRepository in interface FileContext
Returns:
ManagedFile representing the web application folder root.
